data.title: Lawson Enterprise Management System
data.text:
The Lawson Enterprise Management System is specifically designed for services industries and their need to staff, source, and serve.

The Lawson line of applications is focused on meeting the specific business needs of targeted industries, including:

Healthcare

Retail

Public Services

Financial services

Other organizations that provide services

We have geared our applications around these industries' critical need to manage their supply chain, human capital, and financial enterprise. Business experts from these industries direct the creation of applications and look for ways to integrate relevant business intelligence.

Lawson is differentiated by its focus on integrated, industry-specific functionality and a commitment to open standards, which enables greater flexibility and a lower cost of ownership than any alternative.

Lawson Enterprise Financial Management

Lawson Financials helps organizations drive enterprise value with enhanced information for targeting growth and a platform for sustainable compliance. Lawson Financials helps improve transparency of business, strengthens financial discipline, and helps improve business process and reduce costs.

Lawson Enterprise Performance Management

New levels of accountability and increased demands for efficiency are making operational data more valuable than ever. Lawson Enterprise Performance Management Software provides solutions for interpreting and making sense of the numbers that define your needs and illustrate your successes.

Lawson Human Capital Management

Lawson Human Capital Management aims to transform the role of the Human Resources professional from an administrative and policy enforcing role to that of a strategic business partner. The Lawson HR product group is designed to deliver superior, simple and comprehensive products that offer an alternative to large complex ERP and standalone HR solutions.

Lawson Retail Operations Management

Designed for high-volume retailers, Retail Operations solutions help you ensure that decisions made in each location match your corporate vision. The applications facilitate item information, category planning, assortment, pricing, promotions, warehouse replenishment, multichannel ordering, forecasting, and more.

Lawson Supply Chain Management

Realize your vision of end-to-end process efficiency, cost savings, and service excellence. These objectives are attainable, and Lawson Supply Chain Management Suite gives you the tools — spanning a full spectrum of essential activities — to get it done.
